item.description:
The Bounty Hunter @ 7ish, with Dinner @ 6ish

Plan is to meet around 6pm at secret authentic Brazilian Diner
Tudo Na Brasa, 414 Main St, Woburn, MA 01801 tel (781) 938-0101

And then get to the Woburn theater ( very close )
Where we'll meet in the big hallway, left side near the tables
25 Middlesex Canal Parkway, Woburn, MA 01801

for the movie The Bounty Hunter around 7ish
http://movies.yahoo.c...

I will update the times once i know exactly WHEN the movie runs
item.name: The Bounty Hunter @ 7ish, with Dinner @ 6ish
